org.overture.parser.config

Class Properties

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.overture.util.ConfigBase
      • org.overture.parser.config.Properties

  • public class Properties
extends ConfigBase
    The Config class is used to hold global configuration values. The values are read from the vdmj.properties file, and defaults are defined as public statics.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static boolean diags_guards
      Enable extra RT log diagnostics for guards etc.
      static boolean diags_timestep
      Enable extra RT log diagnostics for timesteps.
      static int maxint
      The maximum integer used for type bound type bindings
      static int minint
      The minimum integer used for type bound type bindings
      static boolean numeric_type_bind_generation
      Enable interpretation of numeric type binds
      static int parser_tabstop
      The tab stop for source files.
      static int rt_cycle_default
      The default cycle for RT statements.
      static int rt_duration_default
      The default duration for RT statements.
      static boolean rt_duration_transactions
      Enable transactional variable updates.
      static boolean rt_log_instvarchanges
      Enable InstVarChange RT log entries.
      static int rt_max_periodic_overlaps
      Maximum period thread overlaps allowed per object
      static int scheduler_fcfs_timeslice
      The default timeslice (statements executed) for a FCFS policy
      static int scheduler_jitter
      The timeslice variation (+/- jitter ticks)
      static int scheduler_virtual_timeslice
      The vCPU/vBUS timeslice
      static int traces_max_repeats
      The maximum number of expansions for "+" and "*" trace patterns.

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void init()
      When the class is initialized, we call the ConfigBase init method, which uses the properties file passed to update the static fields above.
